Published December 7 2014

Austin Mann's Gift Guide for iPhone Photographers

Austin Mann's Gift Guide for iPhone Photographers — Nice list of gifts for mobile photographers, and I especially like this little bit: “Many of these tools are a lot of fun and I find them each useful in their own way, but remember: your tools and gear don’t create images… only you do.”

Enjoy your day.
